ISSUE.TITLE: Summary block is not displayed on the order list page in the admin area
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.7 (latest on develop) Steps to reproduce the problem: Go to the Order list page in admin area. Please focus on the 'Summary' section of the order list table. All numbers are displayed as 'undefined' ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/52314713/047a4dbe-0fa8-4036-bc2b-43db1814fd46)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7172 Fixed display error on the order list page in the admin area Merge branch 'Bonzhik-Bonzhik-nonComm' into 4.70-bug-fixes
